title: Futuristic Car Engine Sounds Vol. 1
description: The package of futuristic car engine sounds, including 252 high-quality sound effects, 12 kinds of cars. Perfect for space and sci-fi vehicles.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/futuristic-car-engine-sounds

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7lal85voe9s35t4/MSE%20-%20Futuristic%20Car%20Engine%20Sounds%20Vol.%201.pdf?dl=0


The collection includes sounds for each vehicle:

  • 24 fast and 24 slow acceleration sounds
  • 24 fast and 24 slow deceleration sounds
  • 60 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds at five speeds - idle, low rpm, mid rpm, high and very high rpm
  • 96 transition sounds between speeds


A total of 12 futuristic vehicles in the set.


Each vehicle engine is a complex, massive and multi-layered sound that contains realistic samples of cars, vehicles and several layers of synthesis.Â 


Can be used to create many types of futuristic civilian and military vehicles. Also great for space bikes, spacecrafts, spaceships, large drones and UFOs. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 252 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 12 futuristic cars in total
  • 5 types of engine rpm - idle, low, mid, high, very high
  • 60 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds in total
  • 48 acceleration sounds, 48 deceleration sounds
  • 96 transition sounds between engine rpm
  • perfect for the game genres of simulation, adventure, strategy and more


Number of Audio Waves: 252

Number of Audio Cues: 252

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 34 minutes 24 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
